title: Ruth Bader Glassman | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 82
description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 
The CHAOS is back in studio with  @Rick Glassman   who is going deep undercover for his upcoming role as Ruth Bader Ginsburg. Rick and Chris were JFL Fresh Faces. ALLERGIES are SUS! What causes allergies. Rick takes a stand for what he believes in! Rick gets too heated at basketball games and got him kicked out of his basketball league. 16 weird facts about Ruth Bader Ginsburg! Rick and Chris start flirting. Shout out chubby indian women! We do a deep dive into the TRUTH about Queen Elizabeth the first. Make up in ancient times was poison and would slowly make the royalty go INSANE. Rick had anxiety about his first kiss happening on Hitlers birthday. Gandhi is a freaking jerk!!! Love comes and goes marry your best friend. Chris has fantasies of not having babies. The boys talk p0rn stars! We jump into Chris' trauma and Rick really goes DEEP! The rest of this interview is only on patreon.com/chrisdcomedy
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy
